hitoAmmoutRequired: Amounts are required and can not be less than 0
almost2HitosRequired: At least 2 milestones are required to divide
hitoSplitted: Milestone was split correctly, CRM was updated correctly
opportunityRequired: The opportunity is not loaded in CRM. Update CRM before generating the milestone
hitoQuantityBetween2and5: The number of milestones to be divided must be between 2 and 5
hitoSplittedRequired: Before saving must divide the milestone
hitoCreated: Milestone was created correctly, CRM was updated correctly
